Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I'm a college physics student from Manila here. Hoping to someday get into robotics or rocketeering

I've been playing KSP since the middle of last year. It had me hooked instantly!

I took a short leave to prioritize my acads, but then got back in the game when summer started. And now I'm finally settling into the forums

Looking forward to the community!

And hello right back from the states.....

55 Year old truck driver here. Semi retired (back injury) and playing for almost 2 years.

Ya gotta love a game that draws such a wide variety of players.

(Think of the wide diversity represented by just the two of us. International. Age. Occupations.)

Peace out! Have an explosi....errr.....safe flight program!
